# Intro

I'm testing to see if this works:

```{r}
dats <- data.frame(hi = c(1,2),
                   bye = c(3,4))
library(knitr); library(kableExtra)

kable(dats) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c('striped', 'hover', 'responsive'))
```
